sentences.sContent: Here you should use plural pronoun.
sentences.sCn: 这里你应该用复数代词。

sentences.sContent: No chance! It was the best of the weak pronoun.
sentences.sContent_eng: No chance! It was the best of the weak pronoun.
sentences.sCn: 没有机会！这真是弱者的最好代词。

sentences.sContent: Now if we could only figure out the pronoun problem.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now if we could only figure out the pronoun problem.
sentences.sCn: 现在我们可以解决这个代词问题了。

trans.tranOther: a word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase, such as ‘he’ instead of ‘Peter’ or ‘the man’
